TextEng: "Never mind."
"I think we need to part ways."
"I've changed my mind. Stay with me."
"Wait here until I return."
"I'm sure. Go back to Durnan's inn."
"I want to change your tactics."
"I don't want to change anything else right now."
"I want you to leave any traps that you see alone for now."
"I want you to disarm any traps that you see."
"Don't try to be stealthy anymore."
"Stay stealthy, but only until the next fight."
"Try to remain stealthy all the time."
"Don't help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest."
Text: "내가 잠긴 문이나 상자를 열지 못해도 도와주지 마."

TextEng: "Help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest."
Text: "내가 잠긴 문이나 상자를 열지 못하면 도와줘."

TextEng: "I want to change the distance you stay away from me."
Stay a long distance away.
Keep a medium distance.
Stay close.
"Go ahead and attack as soon as you see enemies."
"Defend me and don't attack until I do."
Text: "나를 지키되 내가 공격하기 전까지는 공격하지 마."

TextEng: "I want to adjust your equipment."
"I need you to use your barbarian rage."
"On second thought, don't bother."
"I'm sure. Do it now."
"What was it you wanted to say earlier?"
"Let's stop and talk for a moment."
"That's enough chatting."
"No, nothing else."
"I'm just wondering how everything is going with you."
"What do you plan to do after all this is done?"
Text: "이 모든 게 끝나면 뭘 할 생각이야?"

TextEng: "A month after that you'll want to leave again."
Text: "한 달 뒤엔 또 떠나고 싶어질 거야."

TextEng: "Finally ready to settle down?"
"What did you do after you left Neverwinter?"
"Do I look like I care about this?"
"What happened next?"
"So you were finally accepted?"
"Where did you go?"
"Nothing more than a strange coincidence."
"Sounds like fate to me."
"Sounds like you were running away."
"You said you came from Neverwinter?"
"That's funny. I don't remember hearing anything about you helping to save Neverwinter."
Text: "재밌네. 네가 네버윈터를 구하는 걸 도왔다는 얘기는 못 들어봤는데."

TextEng: "I remember hearing about you. You're quite famous."
"You must have been very popular in Neverwinter after that."
"I really don't care about this."
"Why not?"
"What do you mean?"
"You're talking about Lady Aribeth, aren't you?"
"Where did you go after that?"
"That's a pretty bleak account of what happened."
"No, not yet. Stay here."
"Yes, come along."
"Not right now."
"What is it?"
"I don't have time for this."
"Is there some point here?"
"Yes, it's a truly dangerous place."
"It's about the challenge. Testing yourself, testing your limits."
Text: "도전에 관한 거야. 자신을 시험하고, 한계를 시험하는 거지."

TextEng: "Greed. There's a lot of treasure down here."
"Fame. It's a place for heroes to prove themselves."
"Maybe it has something to do with Halaster's magic."
"This is crazy. Undermountain is famous on its own merits."
Text: "이건 말도 안 돼. 언더마운틴은 그 자체로 유명하잖아."

TextEng: "I hadn't thought of that before."
"No spell is that powerful."
"What do you mean?"
"We're down here."
"We don't have time for this."
"Fine - out with, half-orc."
"What? Is something wrong?"
"Are you quitting on me, you big baby?"
"Don't worry, the mountain won't collapse on us."
"Maybe you should go back to the surface."
"Don't worry, Daelen. Everything will be fine."
"You're claustrophobic!"
"That seems rather obvious, don't you think?"
"Why would he need a fail safe?"
"Let's just move on."
"Any idea how we get this door open?"
"I think I can handle this without your little tale."
Text: "네 얘기 없이도 해결할 수 있을 것 같은데."

TextEng: "Stand guard? What do you mean?"
"And you think these skeletons are from that tribe?"
"You didn't really tell me anything I didn't already know."
Text: "내가 이미 알고 있던 거 말고는 별로 새로운 얘기가 없었는데."

TextEng: "Thanks for the warning. Let's move on."
"So you think these skeletons will come to life?"
Text: "그래서 이 해골들이 살아날 거라고 생각하는 거야?"

TextEng: "Never mind. I don't want to discuss it."
Text: "신경 쓰지 마. 그 얘기는 하고 싶지 않아."

TextEng: "You keep dying. That's not very helpful."
"You're in the front of every battle. What do you expect?"
Text: "모든 전투의 선두에 서 있잖아. 뭘 기대했어?"

TextEng: "Undermountain is a dangerous place. Death isn't unexpected."
Text: "언더마운틴은 위험한 곳이야. 죽음은 예상 밖의 일이 아니지."

TextEng: "Just stay here, for now."
"I want you to join me again."
"Don't worry about it."
"You were the one staring. Get yourself out of this mess."
"Forget about her, Daelen. She's out of your league."
"What's the problem? I think you make a nice couple."
"Sharwyn, stop picking on Daelen."
"Maybe this isn't the best time for a song, Deekin."
Text: "디킨, 지금은 노래할 때가 아닌 것 같은데."

TextEng: "That's true. Why don't you sing for us now, Deekin?"
Text: "맞는 말이야. 디킨, 지금 노래 한 곡 불러줄래?"

TextEng: "I do not!"
